About me

Summary

I have a lot of experience in using Microsoft Windows and Mac OSX. I also have some experience with Linux I am into mobile application and web development. I have had some experience with developing front-end and back-end for mobile applications and web application during my time as university student. I also have some experience as a team leader in some of the projects/assignments of the courses I have studied

I am enthusiastic, eager to learn new things. I love spending time researching more about web and app development and exploring computer hardware. I usually do exercises, read technology news, and play video games during free time.
